projects.name: Strengthening the capacity of women human rights defenders to improve access to justice.
projects.description:
Note on Unspent Budget – OHCHR WHRD Project
Reported by: Dip Mager, OHCHR
Date: 9 April 2025, 23:09
The OHCHR Women Human Rights Defenders (WHRD) project/activity was suspended pending the review of Thailand by the CEDAW Committee. The project, funded by Sweden, was designed to support WHRDs’ engagement with the CEDAW review process. As the review did not take place in 2023 or 2024 as anticipated, the activity could not proceed and the allocated budget remained unspent.
